title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, the perfect bra for plus-size ladies who value comfort and style. This pack includes a stunning Leopard Satin bra, as well as other colors to suit your preference. 

With sizes ranging from 32C to 50DD, we have the perfect fit for you. The adjustable straps are conveniently located at the front, making it easy to customize your comfort. 

Made with a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra offers a soft and stretchy feel that moves with you. The full coverage design ensures that you feel confident and supported all day long. 

Say goodbye to wires with this wirefree bra, featuring a wide band and rows of hook and eye closures for extra support. 

We understand that simplicity is key, which is why this pack includes one everyday bra and one satin bra for those special occasions. 

Don't miss out on the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, designed with your comfort and style in mind. Order yours today and experience the perfect fit!

With a wide range of sizes available, from 32C to 50DD, you can find the perfect fit for you. The front adjustable straps ensure a customized fit that is easy to adjust, making it accessible for elderly folks. 

Made with a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra offers a soft and stretchy feel that moves with your body. The pack includes one everyday bra and one satin bra, providing you with options for any occasion. 

Choose from a variety of patterns and colors, including leopard print, white, nude, and more. Whether you prefer a bold look or a more classic style, there is something for everyone. 

In addition to its stylish design, this bra offers exceptional support. The wide band and hook and eye closures ensure a secure and comfortable fit. The wireless feature provides added comfort and freedom of movement. 

Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and support with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack. Don't miss out on this must-have addition to your wardrobe. Get yours today!
